pageNotFoundMessage: Dhiifama, fuulli ati barbaadde hin jiru.
selectBothStartAndEndDates: Mee guyyaa jalqabaa fi xumuraa filadhu.
invalidDateRange: Yeroo qabannoo dogoggoraa. Guyyaan xumuraa guyyaa jalqabaa booda ta'uu qaba.
addLedProjectorDescription: Tajaajilli kun qabannoo 'Kutaa' qofaaf kan argamudha.
fillFormToBookDormitory: Dormitorii qabachuuf mee unka armaan gadii guuti.
fillFormToBookFacility: Galma ykn kutaa qabachuuf mee unka armaan gadii guuti.
enterCredentialsToAccessAccount: Akkaawuntii kee seenuuf odeeffannoo seensaa galchi.
individualUserNote: Namoonni dhuunfaa akkaawuntii galmeessisuun isaan hin barbaachisu. Toora tooraan dormitorii qabadhu.
companyRegistrationDescription: Dhaabbata kee marsariitii kanarratti galmeessuuf odeeffannoo guuti.
chapaGateway: Karaa karra kaffaltii Chaappaa tiin kan mirkanaa'edha.
languagesSupported: Afaan Ingiliffaa, Oromoo, fi Amaaraa ni deeggara.
powerfulManagement: Paanaalii humna guddaa qabu kan qabannoowwanii fi fayyadamtoota to'achuuf.
discoverMoreSubtitle: Tajaajilootaa fi mijeessituuwwan keenya ilaalchisee odeeffannoo dabalataa argachuuf QR koodii biroosharii keenyaa iskaanii godhaa.
scanForBrochureDesc: Koodicha iskaanii gochuuf kaameeraa kee fayyadami.
selectDatesForAccurateAvailability: Argamummaa sirrii ta'e arguuf mee guyyoota filadhu.
showingAllAdminAvailableDorms: Guyyaan hanga filatamutti kutaan adminiin hayyamame hundi ni agarsiifama.
selectDateRangeFirstTooltip: Qabachuuf mee dura yeroo qabannoo filadhu.
selectItemsFirstTooltip: Qabachuuf mee wanta tokko ykn isaa ol filadhu.
noDormsAvailableInDateRange: Guyyoota filataman keessatti dormitoriin argamu hin jiru.
noDormitoriesConfigured: Yeroo ammaa kana dormitoriin tokkollee hin qophaa'in.
pleaseSelectDateRangeToEnableBooking: Qabannoo jalqabsiisuuf mee yeroo qabannoo filadhu.
loginToBookMultipleDesc: Wanta hedduu filachuu fi qabachuuf akka bakka bu'aa dhaabbataatti seenuu qabda.
loginAsCompanyToBook: Qabachuuf mee akka bakka bu'aa dhaabbataatti seeni.
accountPendingApprovalBookFacility: Akkaawuntiin kee yeroo ammaa hayyama eeggachaa jira. Erga hayyamameefii booda mijeessituuwwan qabachuu dandeessa.
accountPendingApprovalMultiBook: Akkaawuntiin kee hayyama eeggachaa jira. Erga hayyamameefii booda wantoota qabachuu dandeessa.
pleaseSelectItemsToBook: Mee wanta tokko ykn isaa ol qabachuuf filadhu.
noItemsAvailable: Yeroo ammaa kana wanti argamu hin jiru.
myDormitoryDescription: Haala qabannoo dormitorii kee isa hojjechaa jiru ilaaluuf lakkoofsa bilbilaa kee galchi.
noActiveBookingsFoundForPhone: Lakkoofsa bilbilaa kanaaf qabannoon dormitorii hojjechaa jiru hin argamne.
bookingConfirmedDesc: Kaffaltiin kee mirkanaa'eera. Furtuu fudhachuuf qophaa'i.
paymentAwaitingVerificationDesc: Ragaa kaffaltii kee arganneerra. Gareen keenya dafee mirkaneessa.
paymentProofRequiredDesc: Qabannoo kee mirkaneessuuf mee ragaa kaffaltii kee ol fe'i.
bookingRejectedDesc: Qabannoon kun garee keenyaan kufameera. Odeeffannoo dabalataaf nu qunnami.
contactBuildingAdminsDesc: Gaaffii gamoo adda ta'eef, mee admiinota armaan gadii qunnami.
generalInquiriesDesc: Gaaffiiwwan biroof hundaaf, mee odeeffannoo armaan gadii fayyadami.
dormitoryBookingPendingApproval: Gaaffiin dormitorii kee dhiyaateera. Kaffaltii raawwachuu fi iddoo kee qabachuuf ajaja hordofi.
facilityBookingPendingApproval: Gaaffiin qabannoo mijeessituu kee dhiyaateera. Gareen keenya dafee ilaala.
errorSavingBooking: Qabannoo kee olkaa'uu irratti dogoggorri uumameera. Irra deebi'ii yaali.
bookingPermissionDeniedErrorDetailed: Qabannoo galchuu hin dandeenye. Hayyamni daataa kee sirriitti qindaa'uu isaa mirkaneeffadhu.
errorFetchingItemDetails: Odeeffannoo wanta sanaa fiduu irratti dogoggorri uumame.
loginAsCompanyToBookFacility: Mijeessituu kana qabachuuf, mee akka bakka bu'aa dhaabbataatti seeni.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToBookFacility: Mijeessituu kana qabachuuf akkaawuntii dhaabbataa qabaattee seenuu qabda.
itemNotAvailableErrorMultiBook: '{itemName}' qabannoof hin argamu, filannoo kee keessaa baafameera.
noValidItemsForBooking: Qabannoof wanti sirrii ta'e hin argamne.
fillFormToBookSelectedItems: Wantoota filataman qabachuuf mee unka armaan gadii guuti.
noBookingsMatchSearch: Qabannoon barbaacha kee wajjin walsimu hin jiru.
companyReportsSubtitle: Qabannoowwan keef gabaasa uumi fi buufadhu.
bookingHistoryReportDesc: Yeroo filatame keessatti qabannoowwan kee hunda tarree.
userNotAuthenticatedOrNoCompany: Fayyadamaan hin mirkanoofne ykn dhaabbata wajjin wal hin qabatu.
networkRequestFailedError: Dogoggora neetworkii. Mee qunnamtii interneetii kee mirkaneeffadhu.
userDataMissingError: Daataan akkaawuntii fayyadamaa hir'uudha. Mee adminii qunnami.
registrationSubmittedMessage: Galmeen kee galfameera, hayyama eeggachaa jira.
emailAlreadyInUseError: Imeeliin kun duraan fayyadama irra ooleera.
weakPasswordError: Jechi darbii laafaadha. Yoo xiqqaate qubee 6 qabaachuu qaba.
translationSourceMissingDesc: Mee barreeffama Ingiliffaa hiikamuu qabu galchi.
title: Mata Duree
servicesSectionDescription: Mata duree kutaa 'Tajaajiloota Keenya' kan fuula jalqabaa fi barreeffama kaardii tajaajilaa hunda gulaali.
